news.title: Tribal Welfare and Indigenous Rights Protection Framework
news.content: Tripura High Court establishes comprehensive framework for tribal welfare and protection of indigenous rights, ensuring equitable development and cultural preservation in Tripura.

news.title: Cross-Border Migration and Settlement Guidelines
news.content: The court provides guidelines for managing cross-border migration issues and refugee settlements, ensuring humanitarian considerations while maintaining security protocols.

news.title: Bamboo Industry Development and Forest Conservation
news.content: Tripura High Court promotes sustainable bamboo industry development while ensuring forest conservation, balancing economic growth with environmental protection.
